verses.verse: I <S%G4921>commend<s%> to you <S%G5402>Phebe<s%> our <S%G79>sister,<s%> which is a <S%G1249>servant<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2747>Cenchrea:<s%>

That you <S%G4327>receive<s%> her in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> as <S%G516>becomes<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> and that you <S%G3936>assist<s%> her in <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4229>business<s%> she has <S%G5535>need<s%> of you: for she has <S%G1096>been<s%> a <S%G4368>succorer<s%> of <S%G4183>many,<s%> and of <S%G846>myself<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> and <S%G207>Aquila<s%> my <S%G4904>helpers<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%>

<S%G3748>Who<s%> have for my <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G5294>laid<s%> <S%G5294>down<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5137>necks:<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> not <S%G3441>only<s%> I give <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

<S%G2532>Likewise<s%> greet the <S%G1577>church<s%> that is in their <S%G3624>house.<s%> <S%G782>Salute<s%> my <S%G27>well-beloved<s%> <S%G1866>Epaenetus,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the first <S%G536>fruits<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G2872>bestowed<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> us.

<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G408>Andronicus<s%> and <S%G2458>Junia,<s%> my <S%G4773>kinsmen,<s%> and my <S%G4869>fellow-prisoners,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> are of <S%G1978>note<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> me.
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G291>Amplias<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G3773>Urbane,<s%> our <S%G4904>helper<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G4720>Stachys<s%> my <S%G27>beloved.<s%>
<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G559>Apelles<s%> <S%G1384>approved<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%> <S%G782>Salute<s%> them which are of <S%G711>Aristobulus'<s%> household.
<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G2267>Herodion<s%> my <S%G4773>kinsman.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> them that be of the household of <S%G3488>Narcissus,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G5170>Tryphena<s%> and <S%G5173>Tryphosa,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2872>labor<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G782>Salute<s%> the <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G4069>Persis,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2872>labored<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G4504>Rufus<s%> <S%G1588>chosen<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and his <S%G3384>mother<s%> and <S%G1700>mine.<s%>
<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G799>Asyncritus,<s%> <S%G5393>Phlegon,<s%> <S%G2057>Hermas,<s%> <S%G3969>Patrobas,<s%> <S%G2060>Hermes,<s%> and the <S%G80>brothers<s%> which are with them.

<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G5378>Philologus,<s%> and <S%G2456>Julia,<s%> <S%G3517>Nereus,<s%> and his <S%G79>sister,<s%> and <S%G3652>Olympas,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> which are with them.
<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> with an <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5370>kiss.<s%> The <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> you.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G4648>mark<s%> them which <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G1370>divisions<s%> and <S%G4625>offenses<s%> <S%G3844>contrary<s%> to the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3129>learned;<s%> and <S%G1578>avoid<s%> them.

For they that are <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> not our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> but their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2836>belly;<s%> and by <S%G5542>good<s%> <S%G5542>words<s%> and <S%G2129>fair<s%> <S%G2129>speeches<s%> <S%G1818>deceive<s%> the <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of the <S%G172>simple.<s%>

For <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> is <S%G864>come<s%> <S%G864>abroad<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> men. I am <S%G5463>glad<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G1909>behalf:<s%> but <S%G1161>yet<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> have you <S%G4680>wise<s%> to that which is <S%G18>good,<s%> and <S%G185>simple<s%> <S%G1519>concerning<s%> <S%G2556>evil.<s%>

And the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall <S%G4937>bruise<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G1722>shortly.<s%> <S%G5034><s%> The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with you. <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
<S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> my <S%G4904>workfellow,<s%> and <S%G3066>Lucius,<s%> and <S%G2394>Jason,<s%> and <S%G4989>Sosipater,<s%> my <S%G4773>kinsmen,<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> you.
I <S%G5060>Tertius,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1992>letter,<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> you in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1050>Gaius<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3581>host,<s%> and of the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1577>church,<s%> <S%G782>salutes<s%> you. <S%G2037>Erastus<s%> the <S%G3623>chamberlain<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G782>salutes<s%> you, and <S%G2890>Quartus<s%> a <S%G80>brother.<s%>
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to him that is of <S%G1410>power<s%> to <S%G4741>establish<s%> you <S%G2596>according<s%> to my <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> and the <S%G2782>preaching<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> which was kept <S%G4601>secret<s%> since the <S%G166>world<s%> began,

But <S%G3568>now<s%> is <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest,<s%> and by the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> of the <S%G4397>prophets,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of the <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> for the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G4102>faith:<s%>

To <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G4680>wise,<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> Written to the Romans from Corinthus, and sent by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea
